definition: victory/success/to beat/to defeat/to surpass/victorious/superior to/to get the better of/better than/surpassing/superb (of vista)/beautiful (scenery)/wonderful (view)/(Taiwan pr. [sheng1]) able to bear/equal to (a task)

sentences.english: A couple of years ago, though, curiosity overcame caution.
sentences.chinese: 可是，數年以前，我的好奇心戰勝了謹慎。

sentences.english: But his most important victory was against testicular cancer.
sentences.chinese: 但是他打得最漂亮的一場仗是戰勝了睾丸癌。

sentences.english: You just kind of, have to get over yourself and be like, "All right.
sentences.chinese: 你只需要戰勝你自己，告訴自己“沒關係。

sentences.english: The key to Danish anti-depression is to have low expectations .
sentences.chinese: 丹麥人戰勝沮喪情緒的關鍵在於期望要低。

sentences.english: The triumph of Japanese women football team over The U. S. A surprised the world.
sentences.chinese: 日本女足隊戰勝美國隊讓全世界都很驚訝。

sentences.english: Octopus oracle Paul is predicting Germany will be defeated by Spain at the World Cup semifinal.
sentences.chinese: 八爪魚保羅推測德國在半決賽中將被西班牙戰勝。

sentences.english: He overcomes the odds and defeats the unscrupulous enemy.
sentences.chinese: 他克服了重重困難，最終戰勝了瘋狂的敵人。

sentences.english: Oh, overcome that? Basically just... I worked, you know,
sentences.chinese: 哦，戰勝困難？基本上，我就是工作。

sentences.english: As the night wears on, exhaustion overcomes their discomfort.
sentences.chinese: 隨着夜色深沉，疲憊最終戰勝了她們的不適。

sentences.english: After ten years of careful preparations, he attacked and finally conquered the State of Wu.
sentences.chinese: 經過十年艱苦奮鬥，越過終於雪恥戰勝吳國。

sentences.english: Confidence is the source of strength.
sentences.chinese: 堅定信心是戰勝危機的力量源泉。

sentences.english: In Solidarium, we overcome the impossible.
sentences.chinese: 在蘇利達瑞姆，我們戰勝了不可能。

sentences.english: You must conquer your fear of heights.
Liverpool chalked up yet another home victory against Arsenal.
sentences.chinese: 利物浦隊又一次刷新了本地戰勝阿勝納隊的紀錄。

sentences.english: In the end the revolution is bound to defeat the counterrevolution.
sentences.chinese: 最後，革命一定會戰勝反革命。

sentences.english: As Voldemort, defeat Harry Potter in Duelling Club.
sentences.chinese: 在決鬥俱樂部中以伏地魔戰勝哈利波特。

definition: to defeat/to overpower/to beat/to be defeated
to lose/to transport/to donate/to enter (a password)
enemy/to be a match for/to rival/to resist/to withstand
